templates.name: Ollama (CPU)
templates.description: System service for running LLMs on CPU. Use this version for Mac machines. Manages shared model store for all AI applications.

templates.name: Ollama (NVIDIA GPU)
templates.description: System service for running LLMs with NVIDIA GPU acceleration. Manages shared model store.

templates.name: Ollama (AMD GPU)
templates.description: System service for running LLMs with AMD GPU/ROCm support. Manages shared model store.

templates.name: Open WebUI
templates.description: User-friendly web interface for LLMs. Connects to existing Ollama instance.

templates.name: LibreChat
templates.description: Enhanced ChatGPT clone with multi-model support. Connects to Ollama and other AI providers.

templates.name: Uptime Kuma
templates.description: A fancy self-hosted monitoring tool for tracking the uptime and performance of your websites and applications.

templates.name: Nginx Test
templates.description: Simple Nginx web server for testing

templates.name: Unifi Network Application
templates.description: Enterprise-grade network management system for Ubiquiti devices. Manages APs, switches, and gateways.
